H3.text: in which continent is germany. Europe

A4.text: Germany borders Denmark to the north; Poland and the Czech Republic to the east; Austria and Switzerland to the south; and France, Luxembourg, Belgium, and the Netherlands to the west.

A5.text: Germany is a country in Western and Central Europe.
